channel.title: phil1988/freedi
channel.description: An open OS + display firmware for QIDI 3D printers

item.title: [Announcement] Out of Office until October 24
item.description:
Hello everyone,
I will be on vacation and unavailable for the next 7 days (until 24 October).
If you need help, please refer to the following resources during my absence:
- the repository wiki - the [FAQ](https://github.com/Phil1988/FreeDi/wiki/FAQ) - the open issues and possible workarounds - the discussion section - our [Discord channel](https://github.com/Phil1988/FreeDi/wiki/Community)
I hope these help you resolve any questions while Iâ€™m away. Thank you for your understanding and support! ðŸ˜Š
